amendment.description: An amendment numbered 71 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to decrease and increase funding by $2.5 million for Byrne Justice Assistance Grants Memorial funding dedicated to training to improve police responses to people with developmental disabilities or mental illnesses.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Horn, Kendra S. amendment (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.
